scripts.test:snipe-check: pwsh -NoProfile -Command "$body = @{ username = $env:BRS_USERNAME; password = $env:BRS_PASSWORD; targetDate = (Get-Date).ToString('yyyy-MM-dd'); preferredTimes = @(); players = @(); checkOnly = $true } | ConvertTo-Json; Invoke-RestMethod -Uri 'http://localhost:3000/api/snipe' -Method Post -ContentType 'application/json' -Body $body | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 6"
scripts.test:snipe-preview: pwsh -NoProfile -Command "$body = @{ username = $env:BRS_USERNAME; password = $env:BRS_PASSWORD; targetDate = (Get-Date).ToString('yyyy-MM-dd'); preferredTimes = @(); players = @(); previewBooking = $true } | ConvertTo-Json; Invoke-RestMethod -Uri 'http://localhost:3000/api/snipe' -Method Post -ContentType 'application/json' -Body $body | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 6"
